original_text: Then, Jesus' mother and his brothers arrived and they stood outside the house. They sent someone into the house with a message. They wanted Jesus to come out to speak to them.
korean_text: 그 때에 예수의 어머니와 동생들이 와서 밖에 서서 사람을 보내어 예수를 부르니

sentences.original_text: Then, Jesus' mother and his brothers arrived
and they stood outside the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 집 밖에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They sent someone into the house
They wanted Jesus to come out
